1945268.effect:
Ah, the good ol' days. When cards had stats like mine and the most exciting part of a Duel was seeing whether somebody's best beatstick was "La Jin the Mystical Genie of the Lamp" or "Mechanical Chaser". Back when "Reinforcenents" was a staple and the zones all made sense. Back when the Extra Deck was the Fusion Deck and "Polymerizat1on" was nigh impossible to resolve, but oh, did it feel good to resolve! Now you have all your ROTAs, and your draws, and your negates... I bet none of you whippersnappers even noticed that I misspelled all the card names I mentioned!

(Cannot be used in an official tournament or ranked match.)
1945268.name: Time Well Spent

1945153.effect:
All monsters you control gain 100 ATK for each monster in your GY with the same name as a face-up card you control. You can include any number of "Toad the Jammer(s)" in your Deck, not just up to 3.

(Cannot be used in an official tournament or ranked match.)
1945153.name: Toad the Jammer

1945247.effect:
Set cards you control cannot be destroyed, except by battle. If this card is Normal Summoned: Set up to 3 cards from your hand to your Spell & Trap Zones. (Monsters Set this way are not treated as Spells/Traps while they are Set.) When your opponent activates a card or effect (Quick Effect): Reveal 1 Set card in your Spell & Trap Zone of the same card type (Monster, Spell, or Trap), and if you do, negate that effect, then shuffle the revealed card into the Deck.

(Cannot be used in an official tournament or ranked match.)
1945247.name: Mekanikal Maurvil

1945196.effect:
Neither player can say a sentence with 2 or less words. Neither player can use the colloquial term for a word that is often used when Dueling (such as "eff", "k", etc.). Neither player can refer to a card as anything other than that card's original name.

(Cannot be used in an official tournament or ranked match.)
1945196.name: Zangeki, Hero of Our Time and Savior of Our Galaxy
1945196.treated_as: Zangeki, Hero of Our Time and Savior of Our Galaxy

1853270.effect:
Each player secretly interprets the following sentence as an effect. A third party then secretly determines which interpretation is more accurate to what is written, and whichever player made that interpretation then applies that interpreted effect as this card's effect. (You cannot repeat an interpretation made during this Duel.)
‚óèA wizard arrives and wreaks havoc among the common people, before determining that a boy among them is his new apprentice.

(Cannot be used in an official tournament or ranked match.)
1853270.name: A Long, Long Time Ago

1565249.effect:
At the start of each turn, the turn player must compliment their opponent. If they do not, they must lose 2000 LP. (Neither player can repeat a compliment made during this Duel.) If you inflict battle damage to your opponent: Destroy this card, and if you do, banish it from the GY, face-down.

(Cannot be used in an official tournament or ranked match.)
1565249.name: Live Life, and Love Peacefully

1945215.effect:
When this card is activated: Add 1 "Live Life, and Love Peacefully" from your Deck to your hand, and if you do, destroy this card. If a card in your Field Zone is destroyed, while this card is in your GY: You can place this card from your GY in your Field Zone. At the start of each turn, the turn player must insult their opponent. (Neither player can use a curse word, such as "fuck", "shit", "ass", etc.)

(Cannot be used in an official tournament or ranked match.)
1945215.name: Live Life, and Hate Angrily

1945256.effect:
During the Main Phase, if at least 3 monster effects were activated this turn: Starting with the turn player, each player takes turns declaring the names of cards they are certain exists in the Yu-Gi-Oh! Trading Card Game. If a player declares the name of a card that does not exist in the Yu-Gi-Oh! Trading Card Game, that player skips their current/next turn. (Neither player can repeat a word declared during the exchange if that word was included in the name of a declared card that exists. If they do, they forfeit the exchange.)

(Cannot be used in an official tournament or ranked match.)
1945256.name: Materialization

1951904.effect: You can Tribute this card; add 2 ""A"" cards with different names from your Deck to your hand. You can only use this effect of "Alien Larva" once per turn. Once per turn (Quick Effect): You can banish this card from your GY, and if you do, place 1 A-Counter on a face-up monster on the field.
1951904.name: Alien Larva

1951930.effect:
You can only control 1 ""A" Master Cell Overdrive". If a face-up card(s) with an A-Counters would be destroyed by battle or card effect, you can remove 1 A-Counter from your field, instead. You can only use each effect of the following effects of ""A" Master Cell Overdrive" once per turn.
‚óè When this card is activated: Add 1 "Alien" monster from your Deck to your hand.
‚óè During the End Phase: You can pay 500 LP; activate 1 ""A"" Continuous or Field Spell from your Deck, then you can place 1 A-Counter on 1 face-up card on the field.
1951930.name: "A" Master Cell Overdrive

988114.effect: When an opponent's card or effect is activated that targets an "Alien" or ""A"" card(s) you control: Negate the activation, and if you do, destroy it, and if you do that, place 1 A-Counter on each face-up monster on the field. If your opponent Special Summons a monster while this card is in your GY and you control an "Alien" monster: You can Special Summon this card as an Effect Monster (Reptile/EARTH/Level 4/ATK 2000/DEF 2000). (This card is NOT treated as a Trap.) If Summoned this way, you cannot Special Summon monsters until the end of your next turn, except Reptile and Machine monsters. You can only use 1 "Alien Seeker" effect per turn, and only once that turn.
988114.name: Alien Seeker

837006.effect:
1 non-Link "Alien" monster
If the only monsters you control are "Alien" monsters, you can: Immediately after this effect resolves, Normal Summon 1 "Alien" monster. During the Main Phase (Quick Effect): You can shuffle 1 monster on the field with an A-Counter into the Deck, and if you do, Special Summon this card from the GY, then place A-Counters equal to the shuffled monster's original Level/Rank/Link Rating on a face-up monster(s) on the field, distributed as you wish. You can only use 1 "Alien Mars M-Frame" effect per turn, and only once that turn.
837006.name: Alien Mars M-Frame

1088510.effect: If you are the original owner of this card, you can only control 1 non-Link monster. Once per turn, if there are less than 3 Speed Counters on this card (Quick Effect): You can place 2 Speed Counters on this card; banish 1 "D.N.M.Q." card from your Extra Deck, also you can destroy 1 other card in its column. If this card leaves the field: Pay 1500 LP; add 1 "D.N.M.Q. MK III" from your Deck to your hand.
1088510.name: D.N.M.Q. MK I

1088513.effect: If you are the owner of this card, you can only control 1 non-Link monster. Once per turn, if there are less than 3 Speed Counters on this card (Quick Effect): You can place 2 Speed Counters on this card; banish 1 "D.N.M.Q." card from your Extra Deck, also you can destroy 1 other card in its column. If this card leaves the field: Add 1 "D.N.M.Q. MK I" from your Deck to your hand.
1088513.name: D.N.M.Q. MK II

1088520.effect: If you are the owner of this card, you can only control 1 non-Link monster. Once per turn, if there are less than 3 Speed Counters on this card (Quick Effect): You can place 2 Speed Counters on this card; banish 1 "D.N.M.Q." card from your Extra Deck, also you can destroy 1 other card in its column. If this card leaves the field: Add 1 "D.N.M.Q. MK II" from your Deck to your hand.
1088520.name: D.N.M.Q. MK III

1089029.effect: You cannot Special Summon monsters, except "D.N.M.Q." monsters. During your Main Phase 2, if you control 1 or no monsters, you can Special Summon this card (from your hand) to your opponent's field. During your Main Phase: You can destroy this card and take 500 damage for each card in its column.
1089029.name: D.N.M.Q. Tactical Mines

1088526.effect: Change monsters you control to Attack Position. "D.N.M.Q." cards you control are unaffected by the effects of your opponent's cards, and cannot be destroyed by battle with monsters, in a different column than their own. "D.N.M.Q." monsters you control gain the following effect: ‚óè Once per chain, when an attack is declared or the effect of an opponent's card is activated: You can remove 1 Speed Counter from this card; move this card to an an adjacent unused Main Monster Zone.
1088526.name: D.N.M.Q. Cyberisolated Battlefield

1088416.effect: You can only Summon "D.N.M.Q." monsters. If a card is added to your hand by the effect of a "D.N.M.Q." card: You can Special Summon a monster from your hand to this card's column and place 3 Speed Counters on it. Once per turn while your opponent controls no monsters in this card's column, a monster in this card's column can attack directly. You can only control 1 "D.N.M.Q. Launch Gate".
1088416.name: D.N.M.Q. Launch Gate

1088531.effect: Whenever a "D.N.M.Q." monster would be moved to another Monster Card Zone by a card effect while your Main Monster Zone in this card's column is unused, you can move it to that Zone instead. When an attack is declared: You can send 1 card from your hand or field to the GY; take 1 "D.N.M.Q." Spell from your Deck, and if it was a Continuous or Field Spell, activate it, else add it to your hand. You can only use this effect of "D.N.M.Q. Warp Gate" once per turn.
1088531.name: D.N.M.Q. Warp Gate

1090770.effect: Add 1 "D.N.M.Q." card from your Deck to your hand. During your turn, or if an attack is declared during your opponent's turn: You can banish this card from your GY; banish 1 "D.N.M.Q." card from your Extra Deck. You can only use each effect of of "D.N.M.Q. Jump Beacon" once per turn.
1090770.name: D.N.M.Q. Jump Beacon

1088545.effect: Activate 1 of the following effects.‚óè Shuffle 1 "D.N.M.Q." monster from your field or GY into the Deck; Special Summon 1 "D.N.M.Q." monster from your Deck that is 1 Level higher than that monster. ‚óè Equip 1 "D.N.M.Q." monster you control with 1 "D.N.M.Q." monster from your Extra Deck.You can only use 1 "D.N.M.Q. Urgent Upgrade" effect per turn, and only once that turn.
1088545.name: D.N.M.Q. Urgent Upgrade

1088563.effect: When your opponent activates the effect of a card that is not on the field, or the effect of a Field Spell, while you control a "D.N.M.Q." monster: Negate the activation, and if you do, shuffle that card into the Deck, also, after that, you can remove 2 Speed Counters from a monster you control to Set this card face-down instead of sending it to the GY, but banish it when it leaves the field.
1088563.name: D.N.M.Q. Field Filter

1088920.effect: 2 "D.N.M.Q." monstersWhile this card is banished: You can banish 1 "D.N.M.Q." card from your GY and/or Extra Deck, or shuffle 1 of your banished "D.N.M.Q." cards into the Deck, for each of your banished "D.N.M.Q. Subspace Transfer Gate". You can only use this effect of "D.N.M.Q. Subspace Transfer Gate" once per turn.
1088920.name: D.N.M.Q. Subspace Transfer Gate

1101533.effect: 2 "D.N.M.Q." monstersIf a "D.N.M.Q." card destroys an opponent's card (by battle or by card effect): You can target 1 "D.N.M.Q." monster you control; equip 1 banished "D.N.M.Q." monster to the targeted monster, and if you do, return this card into the Extra Deck. This card must be banished to activate and to resolve this effect.
1101533.name: D.N.M.Q. Subspace Arsenal

1088899.effect: 2 monstersCannot be used as Link Material, except for the Link Summon of a "D.N.M.Q." monster. A "D.N.M.Q." monster equipped with this card gains the following effects:‚óè Once per turn, during the Main Phase (Quick Effect): You can destroy 1 other card in this card's column.‚óè This card gains 500 ATK and can attack twice during the same Battle Phase.A monster can only be equipped with 1 "D.N.M.Q. - Assault Drones".
1088899.name: D.N.M.Q. - Assault Drones

1088959.effect: 2 monstersCannot be used as Link Material, except for the Link Summon of a "D.N.M.Q." monster. A "D.N.M.Q." monster equipped with this card gains the following effects:‚óè Reduce any battle damage you take from battles involving this card by 500 for each Speed Counter on this card.‚óè Once per turn: You can remove any number of Speed Counters from this card; increase its ATK by 500 for each until the end of the next next Battle Phase in which it battled.A monster can only be equipped with 1 "D.N.M.Q. - Afterburner".
1088959.name: D.N.M.Q. - Afterburner

1088963.effect:
2 monsters
Cannot be used as Link Material. If a "D.N.M.Q." monster equipped with this card battles, cards in its column are unaffected by the effects of your opponents cards, except their own, and the effects of your opponent's cards in its column are negated, until the end of the Damage Step. While this card is equipped to a "D.N.M.Q." monster, the first time each turn a "D.N.M.Q." card(s) would be destroyed, it is not. A monster can only be equipped with 1 "D.N.M.Q. - Combat Shielding".
1088963.name: D.N.M.Q. - Combat Shielding

1090873.effect: 1 "D.N.M.Q." monsterIf this card is banished: You can Special Summon 1 "D.N.M.Q." monster from your Hand. If this card is Summoned: You can banish this card; add 1 "D.N.M.Q." Spell from your Deck or GY to your hand. You can only use each effect of "D.N.M.Q. - Subspace Scout" once per turn.
1090873.name: D.N.M.Q. - Subspace Scout

1519818.effect: Once per turn: You can target 1 "Diabound" monster you control; this turn, it can attack directly. (Quick Effect): You can target 1 face-up monster your opponent controls with ATK less than or equal to a "Diabound" monster you control; this turn, that monster cannot be used as material for a Fusion, Synchro, Xyz, or Link, also banish this card until the Standby Phase of the next turn. You can only use this effect of "Diabound Particle" once per turn.
1519818.name: Diabound Particle

696185.effect: If this card is Summoned: You can draw 1 card, and if you do, send 1 card from your hand to the GY, then, if you control "Necrovalley", draw 1 card. You can only use this effect of "Gravekeeper's Specter" once per turn.
696185.name: Gravekeeper's Specter

1951637.effect: During your opponents turn, if your has at least 15 more cards that are banished and in their GY than you have cards that are banished and in your GY (Quick Effect): You can discard this card; send the top 15 cards of your Deck to the GY. You can only use this effect of "Half-Exchanged Spirit" once per turn.
1951637.name: Half-Exchanged Spirit

1519816.effect:
All DARK Fiend monsters you control gain 600 ATK/DEF during your opponent's turn only. You can only activate 1 of the following effects of "Diabound Scatter Nucleues" per turn, and only once that turn.
‚óè You can send 1 card from your hand to the GY; add 1 "Diabound" monster from your Deck to your hand, and if you do, you can Tribute Summon 1 "Diabound" monster during your Main Phase this turn, in addition to your Normal Summon/Set. (You can only gain this effect once per turn.)
‚óè If a DARK Fiend monster(s) is banished by a card effect: You can Special Summon 1 Level 5 "Diabound" monster from your Deck, also, Fiend monsters you control cannot be used as material for a Fusion, Synchro, Xyz, or Link Summon until the end of your next turn.
1519816.name: Diabound Scatter Nucleues

1951615.effect:
Apply 1 of these effects.
‚óè Toss a coin 3 times (for no effect).
‚óè Roll a six-sided die 3 times (for no effect).
1951615.name: Fidget Device

696189.effect: Target up to 2 "Gravekeeper" or "Necrovalley" Spell/Traps in your GY with different card Types (Spell/Trap), except "Gravekeeper's Slab"; add those targets to your hand. This effect cannot be negated by the effect of "Necrovalley". You can only activate 1 "Gravekeeper's Slab" per turn.
696189.name: Gravekeeper's Slab

1951618.effect: Add 1 Level 4 or lower "Ally of Justice", "Flamvell", "Genex" or "Mist Valley" monster from your Deck to your hand, and if you do, you can Normal Summon 1 Normal Monster during your Main Phase this turn, in addition to your Normal Summon/Set. (You can only gain this effect once per turn.) . If you control no monsters Special Summoned from the Extra Deck: You can banish this card from your GY; Special Summon 1 "Ally of Justice", "Flamvell", "Genex" or "Mist Valley" Tuner from your GY, but it cannot activate its effects. You can only use 1 "Irrelevant Origins" effect per turn, and only once that turn, also you cannot Special Summon monsters from your Extra Deck the turn you activate this card, except Synchro Monsters.
1951618.name: Irrelevant Origins

1951738.effect: Equip only to a "Santa Claws" on your opponents field. Take control of it. While your opponent has more total cards on their field than you have cards on your field -1, it gains ATK/DEF equal to the difference x500. It can make up to 2 attacks on monsters during each Battle Phase. If the equipped monster inflicts battle damage: You gain LP equal to the amount inflicted. If this card leaves the field: Your opponent gains 16000 LP.
1951738.name: Santa's Sack

1951735.effect: Add 1 "Santa Claws" or "Santa's Sack" from your Deck to your hand, also, your opponent gains 4000 LP. You can banish this card from your GY; add 1 "Santa Claws" or "Santa's Sack" from your GY to your hand, also, your opponent gains 4000 LP. You can only use 1 "Santa's Sleigh" effect per turn, and only once that turn, also you cannot Normal Summon/Set the turn you activate either effect.
1951735.name: Santa's Sleigh

1951629.effect: If the equipped monster is a monster you own, it gains ATK/DEF equal to the combined Levels, Ranks, and Link Ratings of all monsters on the field x 200. If not, it loses ATK/DEF equal to the combined Levels, Ranks, and Link Ratings of all monsters on the field x 400. If this card is sent from the field to the GY: You can Special Summon 1 "The Calculator", "The Calibrator", or "The Accumulator" from your Deck. You can only use this effect of "The Holy Abacus" once per turn.
1951629.name: The Holy Abacus

1951622.effect:
Once per turn, if a monster(s) is Summoned: You can apply 1 of these effects.
‚óè Gain 500 LP
‚óè Your opponent takes 500 damage.
You can only activate 1 "Tonic of the Old Man" per turn.
1951622.name: Tonic of the Old Man

1951626.effect: All monsters you control gain 200 ATK/DEF for each different Type of monster face-up on the field. When a monster on the field declares an attack: All monsters you currently control gain 100 ATK/DEF (even if this card leaves the field.)
1951626.name: United Front

1951742.effect: During the Main Phase 1 or at the Start of the Battle Phase: Your LP become 1, then during the End Phase of this turn your LP becomes 8000. You can only activate 1 "Lived on 1 Health" per turn.
1951742.name: Lived on 1 Health

1951635.effect: During the Main or Battle Phase: Pay 500 LP and shuffle 1 card from your hand into the Deck; immediately after this effect resolves, Normal Summon 1 monster. You can only use this effect of "Penultimate Offering" once per turn.
1951635.name: Penultimate Offering

1951631.effect: Each turn, the first 3 cards that would be sent to both players GYs are banished instead. You can only activate 1 "Precipice of the Beyond" per turn. Once per turn, during the Standby Phase, you must pay 700 LP (this is not optional), or this card is destroyed.
1951631.name: Precipice of the Beyond

1951741.effect: Discard 1 card; destroy 1 other card you control.
1951741.name: Premature Break

696166.effect:
3 "Gravekeeper's" monsters
Gains ATK/DEF equal to the combined original Levels of the materials used for its Fusion Summon x 100. This card, and any card in your Field Zone, cannot be destroyed by card effects. If you control "Necrovalley" (Quick Effect): You can Special Summon 1 "Gravekeeper" monster from your hand or GY. This effect is unaffected by "Necrovalley", also you must discard 1 card to activate this effect on your opponent's turn. You can only use this effect of "Gravekeeper's Sorcerer" once per turn.
696166.name: Gravekeeper's Sorcerer

1951640.effect:
1 Tuner + 1+ non-Tuner monster(s)
Once per turn (Quick Effect): You can target 1 card in either GY; banish it, also if it was a monster, this card gains ATK/DEF equal to half of that monsters ATK/DEF until the end of the next turn. If this Synchro Summoned card is destroyed by an opponents card effect: You can return all banished cards to the GYs. You can only use this effect of "Fiery Hole" once per turn.
1951640.name: Fiery Hole

1951644.effect:
1 Tuner + 1 non-Tuner monster
Once per turn (Quick Effect): You can discard 1 card; destroy 1 Spell/Trap on the field. If this card was Synchro Summoned using a Synchro Monster as material, you do not need to discard to use this effect.
1951644.name: Flying Freeze

696150.effect:
2 "Gravekeeper" monsters / During the Main Phase: You can activate this effect, also, when you do, you can discard 1 card; apply 1 of these effects. You can activate this effect as a Quick Effect, if this card points to a Special Summoned non-Link "Gravekeeper" monster. You can only use this effect of "Gravekeeper's Spirit" once per turn.
‚óè If you do not control "Necrovalley": You can add 1 "Gravekeeper" monster from your Deck to your hand, then, if you discarded a card to activate this effect, Special Summon 1 "Gravekeeper" monster from your hand.
‚óè If you control "Necrovalley": You can add 1 Spell/Trap that specifically lists the card "Necrovalley" in its text from your Deck to your hand, then, if you discarded a card to activate this effect, you can Set 1 Spell/Trap from your hand.
696150.name: Gravekeeper's Spirit
